item.title: Lawral add a quote by Christopher Morley
item.description: "There is no mistaking a real book when one meets it. It is like falling in love." -- Christopher Morley

item.title: Lawral add a quote by Katherine Anne Porter
item.description: "The past is never where you think you left it." -- Katherine Anne Porter

item.title: Lawral add a quote by Katherine Anne Porter
item.description: "I shall try to tell the truth, but the result will be fiction." -- Katherine Anne Porter

item.title: Lawral add a quote by Peter Shaffer
item.description: "The trouble is if you don’t spend your life yourself, other people spend it for you." -- Peter Shaffer

item.title: Lawral add a quote by Isadora Duncan
item.description: "You were once wild here. Don’t let them tame you." -- Isadora Duncan

item.title: Lawral add a quote by Leo Rosten
item.description: "O, to be sure, we laugh less and play less and wear uncomfortable disguises like adults, but beneath the costume is the child we always are, whose needs are simple, whose daily life is still best described by fairy tales." -- Leo Rosten

item.title: Lawral add a quote by Logan Pearsall Smith
item.description: "People say that life is the thing, but I prefer reading." -- Logan Pearsall Smith

item.title: Lawral add a quote by Doris Lessing
item.description: "Whatever you're meant to do, do it now. The conditions are always impossible." -- Doris Lessing

item.title: Lawral add a quote by Laurie Halse Anderson
item.description: "In one aspect, yes, I believe in ghosts, but we create them. We haunt ourselves." -- Laurie Halse Anderson

item.title: Lawral add a quote by Elizabeth Wein
item.description: "It's like being in love, discovering your best friend." -- Elizabeth Wein

item.title: Lawral add a quote by Elizabeth Wein
item.description: "KISS ME, HARDY! Kiss me, QUICK!" -- Elizabeth Wein

item.title: Lawral add a quote by Elizabeth Wein
item.description: "I am no longer afraid of getting old. Indeed I can't believe I ever said anything so stupid. So childish. So offensive and <i>arrogant</i>. But mainly, so very, very stupid. I desperately want to grow old." -- Elizabeth Wein

item.title: Lawral add a quote by C.S. Lewis
item.description: "Some day you will be old enough to start reading fairy tales again." -- C.S. Lewis

item.title: Lawral add a quote by Julian Barnes
item.description: "This was another of our fears: that Life wouldn't turn out to be like Literature." -- Julian Barnes

item.title: Lawral add a quote by Edward Gorey
item.description: "Books, Cats, Life is Good." -- Edward Gorey

item.title: Lawral add a quote by Victor Hugo
item.description: "He never went out without a book under his arm, and he often came back with two." -- Victor Hugo

item.title: Lawral add a quote by Adrienne Rich
item.description: "There must be those among whom we can sit down and weep and still be counted as warriors." -- Adrienne Rich

item.title: Lawral add a quote by Joseph Mitchell
item.description: "Also, I had not yet found out about time; I was still under the illusion that I had plenty of time - time for this, time for that, time for everything, time to waste." -- Joseph Mitchell

item.title: Lawral add a quote by James Herriot
item.description: "Cats are connoisseurs of comfort." -- James Herriot

item.title: Lawral add a quote by Amy Tan
item.description: "Writing what you wished was the most dangerous form of wishful thinking." -- Amy Tan

item.title: Lawral add a quote by Iris Murdoch
item.description: "People from a planet without flowers would think we must be mad with joy the whole time to have such things about us." -- Iris Murdoch

item.title: Lawral add a quote by Anais Nin
item.description: "And the day came when the risk to remain tight in a bud was more painful than the risk it took to blossom." -- Anais Nin
